title: Clack cracking up too soon
author: VD
content_html: Next week’s column is in… and it may help explain why General Clark is doing what appears to be his best Jekyll-and-Hyde act. You have to wonder, though. Even if you’ve somehow managed to forget taking an explicit position on something that isn’t exactly minor, shouldn’t there be someone in your campaign to poke you in the ribs and remind you before you go and say the exact opposite?
content_text:
Next week’s column is in… and it may help explain why General Clark is doing what appears to be
his best Jekyll-and-Hyde act
.  You have to wonder, though.  Even if you’ve somehow managed to forget taking an explicit position on something that isn’t exactly minor, shouldn’t there be someone in your campaign to poke you in the ribs and remind you before you go and say the exact opposite?
